english.segment1: Come a little closer, dragonfly. Settle down with me a little while. I'm turning off the phone and enterprise. I could use your company, all right
english.segment2: Hey, hey dragonfly. I'd like to stare into your big bug eyes. Get a closer look at your fine wings. Think about some fleeting, pretty things. Hey, hey, hey dragonfly
english.segment3: Come a little closer, dragonfly. Little sapphire slipping through the sky. Between the skaters and the fishing lines. My, my, my dragonfly
english.segment4: Hey, hey dragonfly. I'd like to stare into your big bug eyes. Get a closer look at your fine wings. Think about some fleeting, pretty things. Hey, hey, hey dragonfly. Hey, hey, hey dragonfly
english.segment5: Come a little closer, dragonfly. I love the quiet air you occupy. I'm sitting down right here, right now, alone. To hear the river lapping at the stone
english.segment6: Hey, hey dragonfly. I'd like to stare into your big bug eyes. Get a closer look at your fine wings. Think about some fleeting, pretty things. Hey, hey, hey dragonfly. Hey, hey, hey dragonfly
english.segment7: Hey, hey, dragonfly. I'd like to ride with you tonight. Take in your show, take up your life. Dragonfly, I really like your style
